### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current behaviour

Hello, I installed a new wallet for myself, the blocks started updating to the latest version, but suddenly the computer rebooted and now I canât open my wallet. The error appears: "berkeley database failed to open database environment"
![2024-01-20_11-19-18](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/assets/38570093/9db96736-2098-436f-ae49-62b19d9115b0)


### Expected behaviour

Hello, I installed a new wallet for myself, the blocks started updating to the latest version, but suddenly the computer rebooted and now I canât open my wallet. The error appears: "berkeley database failed to open database environment"
![2024-01-20_11-19-18](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/assets/38570093/9db96736-2098-436f-ae49-62b19d9115b0)

### Steps to reproduce

Hello, I installed a new wallet for myself, the blocks started updating to the latest version, but suddenly the computer rebooted and now I canât open my wallet. The error appears: "berkeley database failed to open database environment"
![2024-01-20_11-19-18](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/assets/38570093/9db96736-2098-436f-ae49-62b19d9115b0)

title: berkeley database failed to open database environment
